targets.query: select mean(value) from merge(/$server.cpu.\d+.user/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.cpu.\d+.idle/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.cpu.\d+.interrupt/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.cpu.\d+.nice/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.cpu.\d+.system/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.cpu.\d+.steal/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$server.cpu.\d+.wait/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from "$server.load.shortterm" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from "$server.load.midterm" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from "$server.load.longterm" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from "$server.memory.used" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from "$server.memory.buffered" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from "$server.memory.cached" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from "$server.memory.free" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from "$server.fs.root.space.used" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from "$server.fs.root.space.reserved" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from "$server.fs.root.space.free" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select max(value) from "$server.processes.state.blocked" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select max(value) from "$server.processes.state.paging" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select max(value) from "$server.processes.state.running" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select max(value) from "$server.processes.state.sleeping" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select max(value) from "$server.processes.state.stopped" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select max(value) from "$server.processes.state.zombies" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select max(value) from "$server.processes.fork_rate" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select max(value) from "$server.net.$interface.if_octets.rx" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select max(value) from "$server.net.$interface.if_octets.tx" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.mysql_commands.delete" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.mysql_commands.insert" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.mysql_commands.select" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.mysql_commands.update" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.mysql_threads.connected" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.mysql_threads.cached" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.mysql_threads.running" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.mysql_octets.rx" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.mysql_octets.tx" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.mysql_locks.immediate" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.mysql_locks.waited" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.rabbitmq.memory" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.rabbitmq.pmap_used" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.rabbitmq.pmap_shared" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from "$controller.rabbitmq.total_nodes" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from "$controller.rabbitmq.running_nodes" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.rabbitmq.consumers" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from "$controller.rabbitmq.messages" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from "$controller.rabbitmq.queues" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select last(value) from "$controller.rabbitmq.connections" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$controller.openstack.$service.http.GET.*/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$controller.openstack.$service.http.POST.*/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$controller.openstack.$service.http.PUT.*/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/$controller.openstack.$service.http.DELETE.*/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$controller.openstack.$service.http.*.1\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$controller.openstack.$service.http.*.2\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$controller.openstack.$service.http.*.3\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$controller.openstack.$service.http.*.4\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select count(value) from merge(/$controller.openstack.$service.http.*.5\d\d/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select last(value) from "$controller.openstack.$service.check_api" where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(null) order asc
select mean(value) from merge(/.*.openstack.nova.instance_creation_time/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select sum(value) from merge(/.*.openstack.nova.instance_state.active/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select sum(value) from merge(/.*.openstack.nova.instance_state.error/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select sum(value) from merge(/.*.openstack.nova.instance_state.deleted/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select min(value) from merge(/.*.openstack.nova.free_vcpus/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select max(value) from merge(/.*.openstack.nova.used_vcpus/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select min(value) from merge(/.*.openstack.nova.free_ram/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select max(value) from merge(/.*.openstack.nova.used_ram/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select min(value) from merge(/.*.openstack.nova.free_disk/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
select max(value) from merge(/.*.openstack.nova.used_disk/) where $timeFilter group by time($interval) fill(0) order asc
